txt.en: You have seen many of these strange lights in Evendim lately -- they seem almost to be multiplying with the presence of Men and other forces. Is it possible that these strange entities are being awakened or attracted by the skirmishes being fought in this land, which was once nearly desolate and empty?

For all the times you have approached the Limrafn and felt the unsettling aura of their presence, you often find yourself wondering if they exist at all -- or are simply some figment of your imagination brought on by long days spent in the desolate quiet of these empty lands and ruins.
